room_title: Escape room "The Elevator" by Michigan Escape Room in Detroit
room_address: 58944 Van Dyke Ave. Washington Twp., MI 48094
room_description:
The surge of power has scrambled the electronics, stopping the elevator and leaving you stuck inside. Can you escape?
This is a motion activated game (non-motion mode available upon request). There will be sudden jerky movements. You must wear flat shoes. Players will be split into two groups to start the game. Call for further information about the game.
